Q: How to use VBA to remove conditional formatting when a workbook get closed A:

As BigBen said the manner as you assign the range matters.
See also my expirence: VBA for Coditional Formating

Sub DeleteCondiFormat()
  With Range("A:Z")
    .FormatConditions.Delete
  End With
End Sub

Q: MySQL configuration: when to use hyphen and when to use underscore A:

No.

It's just one of those things that happen when a team of people design a product.
Different conventions get used leading to inconsistency.

See here: https://web.archive.org/web/20170630122716/https://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.5/en/mysqld-option-tables.html

And scroll to the options starting with ssl, you'll see what I mean.

Q: System.Drawing Bitmap not working on Linux Docker container (.NET Core / DevExpress Report) A:

Microsoft does not recommend using System.Drawing.Bitmap even on Windows where it is supported. On Linux libgdiplus is buggy and hasn't seen development for years.

It's recommended to switch to SkiaSharp which as far as I know supported by DevExpress reports

https://github.com/DevExpress-Examples/reporting-use-devexpress-drawing-skia-engine
